amendment.description: Amendment adds the Information Assurance Directorate of the National Security Agency to the list of Federal agencies that the DHS Under Secretary for Science and Technology shall coordinate with on cybersecurity research and development activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to add the Information Assurance Directorate of the National Security Agency (NSA) to the list of Federal agencies that the DHS Under Secretary for Science and Technology shall coordinate with on cybersecurity research and development activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardin amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
